title: Google Forms API v1 FormResponse Resource
description: Google Forms API forms.responses resource format. See: https://developers.google.com/forms/api/reference/rest/v1/forms.responses

formId.description: Output only. The form ID. Note: Not included in response body when listing responses - use the API path or connection_name metadata.

createTime.description: Output only. Timestamp for the first time the response was submitted.

lastSubmittedTime.description: Output only. Timestamp for the most recent time the response was submitted. Does not track late grade changes.

respondentEmail.description: Output only. The email address (if collected) of the respondent.

answers.description: Output only. The answers to the form questions, keyed by question ID.

totalScore.description: Output only. The total number of points the respondent received for their submission. Only set if the form is a quiz and the response is graded.

grade.description: Output only. The grade for the answer if the form is a quiz.

textAnswers.description: Output only. The answers to a textual question.

fileUploadAnswers.description: Output only. The answers to a file upload question.

answers.description: Output only. Answers to a question.

TextAnswer.description: An answer to a text-based question.

value.description: Output only. The answer value. See the documentation for details on how various value types are formatted.

FileUploadAnswers.description: Answers to a file upload question.

answers.description: Output only. All submitted files for a FileUpload question.

fileId.description: Output only. The ID of the Google Drive file.

mimeType.description: Output only. The MIME type of the file.

Grade.description: Grade information associated with a respondent's answer to a question.

score.description: Output only. The numeric score awarded for the answer.

correct.description: Output only. Whether the question was answered correctly or not.

feedback.description: Output only. Additional feedback given for an answer.

Feedback.description: Feedback for a respondent about their response to a question.

text.description: Output only. The main text of the feedback.

material.description: Output only. Additional information provided as part of the feedback.

displayText.description: The text to display for the link.
The text to display for the video.
